alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Beadle; Brule; Charles Mix; Davison; Douglas; Gregory; Jerauld; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 1:37PM MDT until March 31 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM CDT Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Beadle; Brule; Charles Mix; Davison; Douglas; Gregory; Jerauld; Sanborn
